The Tracker

Ano: 2019

IMDb ID: tt4142394

Classificação: 3.6

Sinopse: In 2008, Loke Hakansson was taking a family vacation in the south of Italy when his wife and his daughter have been kidnapped. Following an attempt of exchange gone awry both wife and daughter have been killed. Ten years later, Hakansson is contacted by a local detective who has re-opened the case and has new information. Reluctantly, Hakansson travels back to Italy to meet the detective. When he arrives he discovers that the detective has committed "suicide". To his dismay, Hakansson is trapped into a web of deceit that forces him to acts of violence to understand what happened to his family.
